subsection_content:
If silica lung persists without treatment or is treated improperly, it will lead to serious complications such as:
Tuberculosis; Severe pneumonia; Lung cancer; Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD); Chronic bronchitis; Scleroderma
subsection_data:
bui phoi silic.json. Symptoms
If silica lung persists without treatment or is treated improperly, it will lead to serious complications such as:
Tuberculosis; Severe pneumonia; Lung cancer; Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD); Chronic bronchitis; Scleroderma
